name: FNaF: Gotta Catch 'Em All
description:
Welcome to FNaF: Gotta Catch 'Em All! This is a Pokémon-style game based on FNaF World and its characters. Its simple really; you fight animatronics, catch them, evolve them and so on! 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bug fixes and new additions will be semi-regular (depends on how fast I discover them!)
